verbs.description: There [V: is] [ARG1: a way forward in Syria] , and Donald Trump has more than once had the courage to stand up to those inside and outside his administration who have urged retreat .
There is a way forward in Syria , and Donald Trump [V: has] more than once had the courage to stand up to those inside and outside his administration who have urged retreat .

There is a way forward in Syria , and [ARG0: Donald Trump] has [ARGM-TMP: more than once] [V: had] [ARG1: the courage to stand up to those inside and outside his administration who have urged retreat] .
There is a way forward in Syria , and [ARG1: Donald Trump] has more than once had the courage to [V: stand] up [ARG2: to those inside and outside his administration who have urged retreat] .
There is a way forward in Syria , and Donald Trump has more than once had the courage to stand up to those inside and outside his administration who [V: have] urged retreat .
